code:
defmodule Solution do
  @spec count_subarrays(nums :: [integer], k :: integer) :: integer
  def count_subarrays(nums, k) do
    max_val = Enum.max(nums)
    counts = Enum.frequencies(nums)

    if counts[max_val] < k do
      0
    else
      indexes = Enum.with_index(nums) |> Enum.filter(fn {num, _} -> num == max_val end) |> Enum.map(fn {_, index} -> index end)
      total = 0

      for start_index <- 0..(length(nums) - 1) do
        for end_index <- start_index..(length(nums) - 1) do
          occurrences = Enum.count(indexes, fn x -> x >= start_index and x <= end_index end)
          if occurrences >= k, do: total = total + 1
        end
      end

      total
    end
  end
end
